China:
Tugh Tem端r's brother Khutughtu Khan Kusala crowned himself emperor of the Yuan dynasty in Karakorum with the support of the Chagatai Khanate.
Tugh Tem端r abdicated in Khutughtu's favor.
Khutughtu died, probably after being poisoned by Tugh Tem端r.
